<h3 id="X31802">X(31802) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC AND ANTI-ASCELLA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; ((b^2+c^2)*a^2-b^4+2*b^2*c^2-c^4)*(5*a^6-9*(b^2+c^2)*a^4+(3*b^4+2*b^2*c^2+3*c^4)*a^2+(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31802) = X(20)-3*X(11402) = X(31804)+2*X(31815)</b>
<p>X(31802) lies on these lines:
{3,11427}, {4,193}, {5,51}, {6,12362}, {20,11402}, {30,1181}, {155,6756}, {235,3060}, {389,1368}, {394,9825}, {427,5889}, {428,11441}, {511,6823}, {515,31812}, {516,31811}, {550,10984}, {568,11585}, {576,12241}, {758,31814}, {971,31808}, {1192,16976}, {1353,6146}, {1498,31670}, {1595,13754}, {1596,5446}, {1598,12166}, {1907,12111}, {1992,18945}, {1993,3575}, {1994,12225}, {2393,2883}, {3167,7487}, {3527,18537}, {3618,11821}, {3627,16655}, {3629,10112}, {3849,31809}, {5448,21847}, {5480,5907}, {5654,21841}, {6102,23335}, {6193,18494}, {6243,15760}, {6515,7507}, {6643,11432}, {6676,17834}, {6816,9777}, {7395,18583}, {7399,11412}, {7403,18436}, {7405,23039}, {7553,18445}, {7691,14389}, {7715,10539}, {9306,11745}, {9786,16196}, {9815,17811}, {9830,31813}, {11479,14853}, {11576,27365}, {11818,31831}, {13292,18569}, {13346,13568}, {13488,19458}, {13567,16625}, {13595,22550}, {14449,15761}, {14516,15801}, {14790,18914}, {15043,30739}, {15873,21849}, {16266,31833}, {19347,31305}</p>
<p>
X(31802) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4, 12160}, {12161, 31815}<br>
X(31802) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (6823, 12233), (31804, 12161)<br>
X(31802) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 193, 12429), (4, 1351, 13142)<br>
</p>
